/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight. The sky above is a serene blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. The street itself is a hive of activity, with several cars in motion, their colors muted under the overcast sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades a testament to the city's architectural diversity. Among these structures, a large billboard stands out, its vibrant colors adding a splash of life to the otherwise monochrome cityscape. The perspective of the image is particularly striking, taken from a high vantage point and looking down upon the street, it offers a bird's eye view of the city's daily rhythm.
